en:
失望
(Shīwàng)

Disappointed

Definitions of 失望
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

verb
    be disappointed
        失望, 失意
    despair
        绝望, 失望, 嗒
    lose hope
        失望

noun
    letdown
        失望, 松弛
